leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 科研可视化与交互分析生态

queries: [WEB] natural language to visualization tools github
[WEB] ai assisted data visualization library github
[WEB] llm text to chart python github

tools.name: STREAM
tools.one_line_profile: Python package for topic modeling, evaluation, and visualization in social science research
tools.detailed_description: A Python package designed for seamless topic modeling, evaluation, and visualization, specifically targeting text analysis and NLP research in the social sciences. It simplifies the extraction and interpretation of topics from complex datasets.

tools.name: AutoViz
tools.one_line_profile: Library for automatic visualization of datasets with minimal code
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that automatically visualizes any dataset of any size with a single line of code. It performs exploratory data analysis (EDA) and generates a variety of charts to help users understand data distributions and relationships quickly.

tools.name: bio-diffusion
tools.one_line_profile: Geometry-complete diffusion generative model for 3D molecule generation
tools.detailed_description: A geometry-complete diffusion generative model (GCDM) designed for 3D molecule generation and optimization. It is used in drug discovery and computational chemistry to generate valid molecular structures.

tools.name: WrenAI
tools.one_line_profile: AI agent for text-to-SQL and automated business intelligence visualization
tools.detailed_description: A generative BI agent that enables users to query databases using natural language, automatically generating SQL queries and interactive visualizations. It facilitates data analysis and insight extraction from structured data sources.

tools.name: Datu Core
tools.one_line_profile: Open-source AI analyst for automated data analysis
tools.detailed_description: Datu Core is an AI-powered analyst tool designed to automate data analysis tasks. It likely provides functionalities to interpret data, generate insights, and potentially visualize results, fitting within the domain of AI-assisted data insight.

tools.name: DataHorse
tools.one_line_profile: Natural language interface for data analysis and visualization
tools.detailed_description: DataHorse allows users to chat with their data, modify it, visualize it, and create machine learning models using plain English. It leverages Large Language Models (LLMs) to make data science and analysis conversational and accessible.

tools.name: DeepBI
tools.one_line_profile: LLM-based AI native business intelligence and data science tool
tools.detailed_description: DeepBI is an AI-native data application that functions as an LLM-based data scientist. It aims to redefine Business Intelligence (BI) through AI-driven infinite thinking, enabling automated data analysis and insight generation.

tools.name: lidar-camera-fusion
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for projecting LiDAR point clouds onto RGB camera images
tools.detailed_description: This tool implements the projection of 3D point clouds obtained from a Velodyne VLP16 LiDAR sensor onto 2D images from an RGB camera within a ROS environment. It is used for sensor fusion visualization and data processing in robotics and perception research.

tools.name: Codify
tools.one_line_profile: Natural language to code converter for data science tasks
tools.detailed_description: Codify enables data scientists to perform tasks such as Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA), data cleaning, preprocessing, visualization, and modeling by conveying the logic in natural language. The system automatically generates the relevant Python code snippets.

tools.name: Data-Purifier
tools.one_line_profile: Library for automated EDA, data cleaning, and preprocessing
tools.detailed_description: Data-Purifier is a Python library designed for Automated Exploratory Data Analysis (AutoEDA), Automated Data Cleaning, and Automated Data Preprocessing. It is tailored for Machine Learning and Natural Language Processing applications, streamlining the data preparation phase.

tools.name: MathViz-E
tools.one_line_profile: Voice-driven AI agent for mathematical visualization
tools.detailed_description: MathViz-E is an AI Agent that enables users to create mathematical visualizations through voice commands. It interprets natural language to generate plots and visual representations of mathematical concepts.

tools.name: AgentWorkbench
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for JADE-based multi-agent system interaction and visualization
tools.detailed_description: AgentWorkbench is an application toolkit based on the JADE framework. It provides functionalities for handling time aspects, agent-environment interaction, visualization, and load balancing, focusing on usability for end-users in multi-agent system research.

tools.name: bagel
tools.one_line_profile: Conversational interface for robotics and IoT data analysis
tools.detailed_description: Bagel enables users to chat with data from robotics, drones, and IoT devices. It acts as a 'ChatGPT for the physical world', facilitating the analysis and interaction with engineering and scientific data generated by physical systems.

tools.name: Auto-Analyst
tools.one_line_profile: Open-source AI-powered data science platform
tools.detailed_description: Auto-Analyst is an open-source platform designed to act as an AI data scientist. It automates various data science tasks, likely including data analysis and insight generation, to streamline the workflow for data professionals.

tools.name: Auto-Analyst-Streamlit
tools.one_line_profile: Streamlit interface for Auto-Analyst AI data scientist
tools.detailed_description: This repository contains the Streamlit-based user interface for the Auto-Analyst platform. It provides an interactive web application for users to leverage the AI data scientist capabilities for data analysis.

tools.name: class-incremental-learning
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch implementation of class-incremental learning algorithms
tools.detailed_description: This repository provides PyTorch implementations of various class-incremental learning methods, including VAE-based generative classifiers and others like EWC, SI, and LwF. It serves as a library for researching and developing continual learning models.

tools.name: continual-learning
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive library for continual learning methods in PyTorch
tools.detailed_description: A robust PyTorch implementation of numerous continual learning algorithms (e.g., EWC, SI, LwF, iCaRL, GEM). It allows researchers to experiment with and compare different strategies for learning from continuous data streams without catastrophic forgetting.

tools.name: llm_qualitative_data_analysis
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for qualitative data analysis using LLMs
tools.detailed_description: This tool leverages Large Language Models (LLMs) via Langchain and Streamlit to assist in qualitative data analysis. It automates the processing and interpretation of unstructured data, suitable for research involving text analysis.

tools.name: BioBART
tools.one_line_profile: Biomedical generative language model for text processing
tools.detailed_description: BioBART is a biomedical generative language model pretrained on large-scale biomedical corpora. It is designed for various biomedical natural language processing tasks, serving as a foundational model for scientific text analysis in biology and medicine.

tools.name: Open Data QnA
tools.one_line_profile: Conversational interface for database interaction using LLM Agents
tools.detailed_description: Open Data QnA is a Python library that enables users to chat with their databases using LLM Agents on Google Cloud. It implements NL2SQL (Natural Language to SQL) methods to facilitate conversational data analysis and retrieval.

tools.name: Grid2Viz
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization tool for Reinforcement Learning agents in power grid operations
tools.detailed_description: A dedicated visualization tool designed to analyze and display the decision-making process of RL agents within the Grid2Op framework for power network management.

tools.name: mpl-tc-fonts
tools.one_line_profile: Font utility for Traditional Chinese character support in Matplotlib
tools.detailed_description: A Python package designed to resolve font rendering issues (Tofu) when using Traditional Chinese characters in Matplotlib scientific plots.

tools.name: 3D-LIDAR-Multi-Object-Tracking
tools.one_line_profile: C++ implementation of 3D Multi-Object Tracking for LiDAR point clouds
tools.detailed_description: A robust C++ implementation for detecting and tracking multiple objects in 3D space using LiDAR point cloud data, essential for autonomous systems research.

tools.name: Lidar With Velocity
tools.one_line_profile: Correction tool for moving object distortion in oscillating scanning LiDARs
tools.detailed_description: An algorithm implementation to correct point cloud distortion caused by moving objects in oscillating scanning LiDARs by fusing data with camera inputs.

tools.name: Chart2Text
tools.one_line_profile: Transformer-based model for generating natural language explanations from charts
tools.detailed_description: A tool that adapts Transformer models to generate natural language summaries and explanations directly from chart data, facilitating automated insight generation.

tools.name: Depth Enhanced Monocular Odometry
tools.one_line_profile: Visual odometry system using camera and LiDAR fusion
tools.detailed_description: A depth-enhanced monocular odometry implementation that combines camera and LiDAR data for precise state estimation in robotics and autonomous navigation.

tools.name: Flenser
tools.one_line_profile: Minimal automated exploratory data analysis (EDA) tool
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight Python tool designed to automate the process of exploratory data analysis, providing quick insights and visualizations for datasets.

tools.name: Luxor.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Julia library for vector graphics and scientific drawing
tools.detailed_description: A Julia package for creating 2D vector graphics, static images, and animations, often used for generating scientific diagrams and visualizations.

tools.name: Rath
tools.one_line_profile: Automated data exploratory analysis and visualization platform
tools.detailed_description: An open-source, AI-augmented automated data analysis and visualization tool that discovers patterns, insights, and causal relationships in multi-dimensional data.

tools.name: PyGWalker
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive data visualization UI for pandas DataFrames
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that turns pandas and polars DataFrames into a Tableau-style interactive user interface for visual analysis and data exploration within Jupyter notebooks.

tools.name: MAPF Visualizer
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization tool for Multi-Agent Path Finding research
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight visualizer designed specifically for research in Multi-Agent Path Finding (MAPF), allowing researchers to visualize and debug agent movements and conflicts.

tools.name: LidarView
tools.one_line_profile: Real-time visualization and processing software for 3D LiDAR data
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive software application based on ParaView for real-time reception, recording, visualization, and processing of 3D LiDAR sensor data.

tools.name: MASArena
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking and visualization framework for multi-agent systems
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive framework for evaluating and benchmarking single and multi-agent systems, featuring built-in visualization tools to analyze agent performance and interactions.

tools.name: Leaf Playground
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for LLM-based agent scenario simulation and evaluation
tools.detailed_description: A framework designed to build, visualize, and evaluate scenario simulations involving human and LLM-based agents, supporting automated evaluation of agent actions.

tools.name: ParaView-MCP
tools.one_line_profile: LLM integration for natural language control of ParaView visualizations
tools.detailed_description: An integration of multimodal Large Language Models with ParaView via the Model Context Protocol, enabling users to control scientific visualizations using natural language commands.

tools.name: livox_camera_lidar_calibration
tools.one_line_profile: Extrinsic parameter calibration tool for Livox LiDAR and cameras
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed to calibrate the extrinsic parameters between Livox LiDAR sensors and cameras, essential for sensor fusion in robotics and autonomous systems.

tools.name: Lux.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Explicitly parameterized deep learning framework for Julia
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning library for Julia that focuses on explicit parameterization and functional design, making it highly suitable for Scientific Machine Learning (SciML) and integration with differential equation solvers.

tools.name: Lidar_AI_Solution
tools.one_line_profile: GPU-accelerated LiDAR AI solutions and libraries
tools.detailed_description: A collection of GPU-accelerated libraries (cuPCL, cuOSD) and deep learning networks (PointPillars, CenterPoint, BEVFusion) for LiDAR point cloud processing and perception in robotics and autonomous driving.

tools.name: nv-ingest
tools.one_line_profile: Microservice for document content and metadata extraction
tools.detailed_description: A scalable microservice designed to extract text, tables, charts, and images from documents (PDFs, etc.) to support downstream generative AI and RAG applications in scientific and enterprise contexts.

tools.name: multiplex-plot
tools.one_line_profile: Library for creating and annotating network graph visualizations
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed to create beautiful and annotated network graph visualizations and text visualizations, suitable for analyzing complex networks in scientific research.

tools.name: AdvancedSerial
tools.one_line_profile: Arduino library and client for real-time data plotting
tools.detailed_description: An Arduino library extending serial functionality to transmit data, paired with a C# client for real-time plotting, useful for data acquisition and monitoring in experimental setups.

tools.name: InsTag
tools.one_line_profile: Data analysis tool for LLM supervised fine-tuning
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed to analyze and tag instruction datasets for Large Language Models, aiding in the understanding of data distribution, complexity, and diversity for AI research.

tools.name: viz-gpt
tools.one_line_profile: Contextual data visualization using Chat Interface
tools.detailed_description: A tool that enables users to create contextual data visualizations from tabular datasets using a natural language chat interface, leveraging Large Language Models.

tools.name: LiDAR-MOS
tools.one_line_profile: Moving Object Segmentation in 3D LiDAR Data
tools.detailed_description: A learning-based approach and tool for moving object segmentation in 3D LiDAR data, exploiting sequential information for robotics and autonomous driving research.

tools.name: lidar-bonnetal
tools.one_line_profile: Semantic and Instance Segmentation of LiDAR point clouds
tools.detailed_description: A framework for semantic and instance segmentation of LiDAR point clouds, providing implementations of various deep learning models for perception tasks.

tools.name: fast_eda
tools.one_line_profile: Fast data exploration library using Sweetviz
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that simplifies and accelerates exploratory data analysis (EDA) by providing a wrapper around Sweetviz and other tools for quick insight generation.

tools.name: LLMCode
tools.one_line_profile: LLM-assisted qualitative data coding and analysis tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool that leverages Large Language Models (LLMs) to assist in the qualitative coding and analysis of text data, automating parts of the thematic analysis process for social science research.

tools.name: adjustText
tools.one_line_profile: Automatic label placement library for matplotlib
tools.detailed_description: A small but essential library for automatically adjusting text positions in matplotlib plots to minimize overlaps, widely used in scientific plotting to improve readability.

tools.name: OpenBias
tools.one_line_profile: Open-set bias detection framework for text-to-image models
tools.detailed_description: A tool for detecting and quantifying open-set biases in text-to-image generative models, serving the scientific task of AI model evaluation and safety analysis.

tools.name: PlotSense
tools.one_line_profile: AI-powered visualization assistant for data insight
tools.detailed_description: An AI assistant designed to help data professionals create visualizations and gain insights from datasets through natural language interactions and smart suggestions.

tools.name: KELA-Agents
tools.one_line_profile: Natural language interface for Excel data analysis
tools.detailed_description: An AI-powered agent system that enables users to query, analyze, and visualize data within Excel spreadsheets using natural language commands.

tools.name: csvGPT
tools.one_line_profile: Web tool for chatting with CSV data
tools.detailed_description: A web application that allows users to upload CSV files and perform data visualization and analysis through interactive conversations with an AI model.

tools.name: dataline
tools.one_line_profile: Conversational data analysis and visualization interface
tools.detailed_description: A tool for chatting with data sources (CSV, SQL databases) to generate analyses and visualizations automatically, fitting the AI-assisted insight category.

tools.name: dataprep-ai
tools.one_line_profile: Automated data cleaning and preparation tool
tools.detailed_description: An opinionated tool for cleaning and preparing dataframes (pandas/Polars) with one line of code, facilitating the data preprocessing step in scientific analysis.

tools.name: lidar_obstacle_detector
tools.one_line_profile: 3D LiDAR object detection and tracking library
tools.detailed_description: A C++ library implementing Euclidean clustering, RANSAC, and Hungarian algorithm for processing 3D LiDAR point clouds, used in robotics and perception research.

tools.name: ChartSpark
tools.one_line_profile: Semantic context embedding for chart generation
tools.detailed_description: A generative model framework for creating charts with embedded semantic context, bridging text-to-image generation with scientific visualization needs.

tools.name: mapf-visualizer
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization tool for Multi-Agent Path Finding
tools.detailed_description: A web-based visualization tool specifically designed for Multi-Agent Path Finding (MAPF) algorithms, aiding in the analysis and debugging of robotics and AI path planning research.

tools.name: preswald
tools.one_line_profile: WASM-based framework for interactive data apps
tools.detailed_description: A framework for building and deploying interactive data analysis and visualization applications using Python and WASM, enabling offline-capable scientific dashboards.

tools.name: Table Extraction Tool
tools.one_line_profile: OCR and computer vision based tool for extracting structured tabular data from images
tools.detailed_description: A solution combining OCR and computer vision to extract structured tabular data from images, facilitating data preprocessing for analysis and LLM integration.

tools.name: Imaging Lidar Place Recognition
tools.one_line_profile: Robust place recognition algorithm using imaging LiDAR data
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of a robust place recognition method using imaging LiDAR, applicable in robotics and autonomous systems for localization and mapping tasks.

tools.name: LiDARTag
tools.one_line_profile: Real-time fiducial tag system for point clouds
tools.detailed_description: A package for LiDARTag, a fiducial marker system designed for 3D point clouds, enabling robust identification and pose estimation in LiDAR data.

tools.name: Extrinsic LiDAR Camera Calibration
tools.one_line_profile: Target-based extrinsic calibration tool for 3D LiDAR and camera
tools.detailed_description: A package for performing extrinsic calibration between a 3D LiDAR and a camera using a target-based approach, essential for sensor fusion in robotics.

tools.name: AutoMLPipe-BC
tools.one_line_profile: Automated machine learning analysis pipeline for binary classification
tools.detailed_description: A rigorous, automated machine learning pipeline for binary classification, incorporating data cleaning, feature selection, hyperparameter optimization, and reporting. Developed by UrbsLab for biomedical informatics applications.

tools.name: Streamline Analyst
tools.one_line_profile: LLM-powered AI agent for automated data analysis
tools.detailed_description: An AI agent framework leveraging Large Language Models to streamline the end-to-end data analysis process, from data processing to visualization and insight generation.

tools.name: DiffBIR
tools.one_line_profile: Blind image restoration using generative diffusion prior
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework for blind image restoration that leverages generative diffusion priors to recover high-quality images from degraded inputs, applicable to scientific imaging enhancement.

tools.name: autoEDA
tools.one_line_profile: Automated exploratory data analysis library for R
tools.detailed_description: An R library designed to automate the process of exploratory data analysis (EDA), generating summaries and visualizations to facilitate rapid data understanding.

tools.name: calibration_camera_lidar
tools.one_line_profile: Joint camera and LiDAR calibration ROS package
tools.detailed_description: A ROS package for the joint calibration of camera and LiDAR sensors, derived from Autoware, enabling precise sensor alignment for autonomous systems.

tools.name: segment-lidar
tools.one_line_profile: LiDAR data segmentation using Segment-Anything Model (SAM)
tools.detailed_description: A Python package that leverages the Segment-Anything Model (SAM) to perform semantic segmentation on 3D LiDAR point cloud data.

tools.name: Veridical Flow
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for building stable and trustworthy data-science pipelines
tools.detailed_description: A Python library implementing the PCS (Predictability, Computability, Stability) framework to facilitate the construction of reliable and interpretable data science pipelines.

tools.name: cam_lidar_calibration
tools.one_line_profile: Optimised sample selection for robust LiDAR-camera calibration
tools.detailed_description: A ROS package for estimating calibration parameters between camera and LiDAR frames, featuring optimized sample selection for improved robustness.

tools.name: Thread
tools.one_line_profile: AI-powered Jupyter Notebook environment for interactive data analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Jupyter Notebook interface enhanced with local AI capabilities to generate code cells, automatically fix errors, and enable natural language chat with data, streamlining the scientific analysis workflow.

tools.name: semlib
tools.one_line_profile: Library for building semantic data processing pipelines using LLMs
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that enables the construction of robust data processing and analysis pipelines leveraging Large Language Models, useful for extracting structured scientific data from unstructured text or performing semantic filtering.

tools.name: lidar_camera_calibration
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for rigid-body transformation between LiDAR and camera
tools.detailed_description: A ROS package designed to find the rigid-body transformation between a LiDAR and a camera using 3D-3D point correspondences, essential for sensor fusion and data alignment in robotics and autonomous systems research.

tools.name: mcp-server-chart
tools.one_line_profile: MCP server for AI-driven chart generation using AntV
tools.detailed_description: A Model Context Protocol (MCP) server that wraps the AntV visualization library, enabling Large Language Models to automatically generate and render over 25 types of visual charts for data analysis and insight.

tools.name: sketch
tools.one_line_profile: AI code-writing assistant for pandas dataframes
tools.detailed_description: An AI assistant extension for pandas that understands data context, allowing users to ask natural language questions to generate code, create visualizations, and gain insights directly from their dataframes.

tools.name: StringZilla
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance string processing library for scientific computing
tools.detailed_description: A hyper-optimized string processing library leveraging SIMD (AVX-512, NEON) for accelerated search, hashing, edit distances, and sketching (MinHash), widely applicable in bioinformatics (sequence analysis) and large-scale text mining.

tools.name: BagOfWords
tools.one_line_profile: AI analyst platform for converting natural language to SQL, Python code, and dashboards
tools.detailed_description: BagOfWords is an AI-powered data analysis platform that connects LLMs to various data sources. It provides capabilities for Text-to-SQL, Text-to-Python, and Text-to-Dashboard generation, enabling automated insight extraction and visualization construction from natural language queries.

tools.name: Bodo
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance parallel compute engine for Python data analytics
tools.detailed_description: Bodo is a high-performance data processing engine that automatically parallelizes Python code (Pandas/NumPy) for HPC-level performance. It is essential for interactive analysis of large-scale scientific datasets, enabling scientists to run standard Python data workflows at supercomputing scale.

tools.name: AI Data Science Team
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-agent framework for automating data science and analysis workflows
tools.detailed_description: A framework of AI agents designed to perform common data science tasks such as data cleaning, exploratory data analysis (EDA), and visualization. It acts as an automated assistant for data analysts and scientists to accelerate the insight generation process.

tools.name: Neat Vision
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization tool for NLP model attention mechanisms
tools.detailed_description: Neat Vision is a framework-agnostic visualization tool designed to analyze and display the attention mechanisms of deep learning models used in Natural Language Processing. It aids researchers in understanding model behavior and interpreting internal representations.

tools.name: Helipad
tools.one_line_profile: An agent-based modeling framework for Python with interactive visualization
tools.detailed_description: Helipad is an agent-based modeling (ABM) framework designed for scientific simulation in fields like economics, biology, and social sciences. It provides a hook-based architecture for defining agent behaviors and includes powerful real-time visualization capabilities to observe model dynamics and collect data.

tools.name: Lidar_IMU_Localization
tools.one_line_profile: Lidar-IMU localization system with prior map and LIO constraints
tools.detailed_description: A robotics research tool for 3D localization using Lidar and IMU sensor fusion. It implements advanced algorithms for state estimation and mapping, utilizing prior map constraints to improve accuracy in complex environments, applicable in autonomous systems and spatial analysis.

tools.name: lidar_imu_calib
tools.one_line_profile: Automatic extrinsic calibration tool for 3D Lidar and IMU
tools.detailed_description: A scientific tool for the automatic calibration of extrinsic parameters between 3D Lidar sensors and Inertial Measurement Units (IMU). It addresses the sensor alignment problem critical for accurate data collection in robotics and mobile mapping systems.

tools.name: PEDSIM
tools.one_line_profile: Microscopic pedestrian crowd simulation system
tools.detailed_description: PEDSIM is a microscopic pedestrian crowd simulation library suitable for crowd dynamics research, evacuation simulation, and architectural visualization. It allows for quantitative measurements of pedestrian density and evacuation times, supporting scientific studies in safety and social dynamics.

tools.name: Spectral-Clara-Lux-Tracer
tools.one_line_profile: Physically based ray tracer with spectral rendering capabilities
tools.detailed_description: A physically based rendering engine that supports multiple shading models and Color Rendering Index (CRI) evaluation. It is designed for optical simulation and research into light transport and spectral rendering techniques.

tools.name: ifc-2-duckdb
tools.one_line_profile: Converter for IFC building data to DuckDB for analysis
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed to convert Industry Foundation Classes (IFC) data, a standard for Building Information Modeling (BIM), into DuckDB format. This facilitates scalable analysis and querying of complex architectural and engineering data.

tools.name: Pattern
tools.one_line_profile: Web mining module for NLP, machine learning, and network analysis
tools.detailed_description: Pattern is a web mining module for Python that provides tools for data mining (Google, Twitter, Wikipedia API, web crawler), natural language processing (POS tagging, n-grams, sentiment analysis), machine learning (vector space model, clustering, classification), and network analysis (graph centrality, visualization). It is widely used in computational linguistics and social science research.

tools.name: MiniAgents
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization tool for simulacra and agent interactions
tools.detailed_description: A visualization tool designed for analyzing and observing the behavior of 'simulacra' or mini-agents in a simulation environment. It aids in the study of agent-based systems and emergent behaviors.

tools.name: SciRS
tools.one_line_profile: Scientific computing and AI library for Rust
tools.detailed_description: A library for scientific computing and artificial intelligence implemented in Rust. It aims to provide efficient tools for numerical analysis and machine learning tasks within the Rust ecosystem.

tools.name: BIGM-motion-tracking
tools.one_line_profile: Generative myocardial motion tracking with biomechanics-informed prior
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning-based tool for tracking myocardial motion in medical imaging. It utilizes a generative approach with biomechanics-informed priors to explore the latent space, improving the accuracy of motion estimation in cardiac analysis.

tools.name: data-analysis-llm-agent
tools.one_line_profile: LLM-powered agent for database querying and result visualization
tools.detailed_description: An AI agent designed to automate data analysis tasks. It leverages Large Language Models (LLMs) to generate SQL queries from natural language, execute them against databases, and automatically visualize the results, facilitating automated insight generation.

tools.name: AItrika
tools.one_line_profile: Medical research assistant using LLM and RAG
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed to enhance medical research by utilizing Large Language Models (LLM) and Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG). It assists researchers in querying and synthesizing information from medical literature or data sources.

tools.name: auto-eda
tools.one_line_profile: Automated Exploratory Data Analysis tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool for simplifying and automating the process of Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA). It generates insights and visualizations from datasets to help researchers understand data distributions and relationships quickly.

tools.name: DataLingua
tools.one_line_profile: AI-powered tool for natural language to data visualization
tools.detailed_description: An AI tool that transforms natural language questions into interactive data visualizations. It automatically generates and executes SQL queries based on user input, allowing for data exploration without requiring SQL knowledge.

tools.name: fhiry
tools.one_line_profile: FHIR to Pandas DataFrame converter for medical data analysis
tools.detailed_description: A utility library that converts FHIR (Fast Healthcare Interoperability Resources) bundles into Pandas DataFrames. This enables data scientists and researchers to easily perform analytics and machine learning on standardized medical health records.

tools.name: ExcelChat
tools.one_line_profile: Streamlit application for chatting with Excel files
tools.detailed_description: A web application built with Streamlit that allows users to interact with Excel files using natural language. It enables users to ask questions about their data and receive answers or insights, functioning as an automated insight tool for spreadsheet data.

tools.name: nlg-metricverse
tools.one_line_profile: End-to-end library for evaluating Natural Language Generation (NLG) models
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive Python library designed to streamline the evaluation of Natural Language Generation models. It provides a unified interface for accessing a wide range of metrics, visualization tools, and benchmarking capabilities, facilitating rigorous assessment of NLG systems.

tools.name: AgentOk
tools.one_line_profile: Visual platform for building and orchestrating multi-agent AI applications
tools.detailed_description: A low-code/no-code platform that enables the visual construction and orchestration of multi-agent systems. It allows users to design agent workflows, interactions, and logic using a drag-and-drop interface, facilitating the development of complex AI agentic applications.

tools.name: llmgraph
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for generating knowledge graphs from text using LLMs
tools.detailed_description: A tool that leverages Large Language Models (LLMs) to extract entities and relationships from text and construct knowledge graphs. It enables the visualization of complex information structures and supports automated insight generation from unstructured data.

tools.name: Culebra
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-agent behavior library and plugin for Grasshopper/Rhino
tools.detailed_description: A computational design tool that implements multi-agent systems within the Grasshopper/Rhino environment. It enables the simulation of complex, dynamic behaviors and interactions for architectural and spatial design, supporting 2D/3D visualization and data analysis.

tools.name: Culebra_Java
tools.one_line_profile: Java library for multi-agent behavior simulation
tools.detailed_description: The core Java library powering the Culebra multi-agent system. It provides the fundamental objects and behaviors for creating dynamic multi-agent interactions, focused on hybrid system interactions with custom visualization and performance features.

tools.name: lidar_align
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for extrinsic calibration between 3D Lidar and 6-DOF pose sensors
tools.detailed_description: A method and tool for finding the extrinsic calibration (relative rotation and translation) between a 3D Lidar and a 6-DOF pose sensor (e.g., IMU, GNSS, or odometry). It optimizes the alignment to minimize the error between the Lidar scans and the trajectory.

tools.name: agent-prism
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization components for AI agent execution traces
tools.detailed_description: A library of React components designed to visualize the execution traces and internal reasoning processes of AI agents. It helps researchers and developers debug, understand, and analyze the behavior of autonomous agents through interactive visualizations.

tools.name: Sweetviz
tools.one_line_profile: Automated Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA) library
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that generates high-density, fully self-contained HTML reports for Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA). It allows for quick visualization and comparison of datasets, target value analysis, and feature association discovery with minimal code.

tools.name: LuxGI
tools.one_line_profile: Hybrid Global Illumination rendering solution
tools.detailed_description: A hybrid Global Illumination (GI) rendering solution that combines Ray-Tracing and SDF-Tracing based on DDGI (Dynamic Diffuse Global Illumination). It is designed for high-quality, real-time lighting simulation in computer graphics.

tools.name: RTutor
tools.one_line_profile: AI-powered tool for natural language data analysis and code generation
tools.detailed_description: An AI-based tool that allows users to interact with their data using natural language. It automatically generates R code for data analysis and visualization, executing it to provide insights and plots, effectively bridging the gap between natural language and statistical programming.

tools.name: BIA Bob
tools.one_line_profile: Jupyter-based AI assistant for bio-image analysis and processing
tools.detailed_description: A Jupyter and LLM-based assistant designed to help researchers interact with bio-image data. It generates code for image processing tasks, facilitating bio-image analysis workflows through natural language prompts.

tools.name: lidar_camera_calibration
tools.one_line_profile: Lightweight package for LiDAR-camera extrinsic calibration
tools.detailed_description: A ROS package for calibrating the extrinsic parameters between a LiDAR and a camera using OpenCV and PCL. It employs PnP and Levenberg-Marquardt optimization to align sensor data, essential for sensor fusion in robotics and autonomous systems research.

tools.name: LiDAR_IMU_Init
tools.one_line_profile: Robust real-time LiDAR-inertial system initialization method
tools.detailed_description: An algorithm implementation for initializing LiDAR-inertial systems. It provides robust estimation of temporal and spatial parameters for sensor fusion, critical for mapping and SLAM tasks in dynamic environments.

tools.name: joint-lidar-camera-calib
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for joint intrinsic and extrinsic LiDAR-camera calibration
tools.detailed_description: A C++ tool developed by HKU-MARS for the joint calibration of LiDAR and camera systems. It handles both intrinsic and extrinsic parameters to ensure accurate data alignment for 3D perception and mapping.

tools.name: GemInsights
tools.one_line_profile: AI-powered dataframe analysis tool using Gemini for automated insights
tools.detailed_description: A tool that leverages Gemini AI to analyze dataframes and generate insights, offering an automated alternative to traditional manual data analysis methods.

tools.name: BertViz
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive visualization tool for attention mechanisms in NLP models
tools.detailed_description: A tool for visualizing attention in Transformer models such as BERT, GPT2, and BART, aiding in the interpretability and analysis of model behavior.

tools.name: direct_visual_lidar_calibration
tools.one_line_profile: Toolbox for target-less LiDAR-camera calibration
tools.detailed_description: A ROS-based toolbox for calibrating LiDARs and cameras without the need for specific targets, facilitating sensor fusion in robotics and autonomous systems.

tools.name: luxpy
tools.one_line_profile: Python toolbox for lighting and color science
tools.detailed_description: A library providing tools for colorimetric and photometric calculations, spectral data analysis, and lighting science applications.

tools.name: Lance
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance columnar data format for multimodal AI
tools.detailed_description: An open lakehouse format designed for multimodal AI data, offering fast random access, vector indexing, and data versioning, optimized for scientific and AI data workflows.

tools.name: rl-starter-files
tools.one_line_profile: Ready-to-use scripts for training and evaluating RL agents
tools.detailed_description: A set of scripts and workflows to immediately train, visualize, and evaluate Reinforcement Learning agents without writing code, acting as a wrapper for torch-ac.

tools.name: visual-automata
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization library for automata theory
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that wraps the Automata library to provide visualization features for finite automata, pushdown automata, and Turing machines.

tools.name: Data Analysis Agent
tools.one_line_profile: LLM-based agent for automated data analysis
tools.detailed_description: An intelligent agent powered by Large Language Models designed to perform automated data analysis tasks, interpreting data and generating insights.

tools.name: claude-data-analysis
tools.one_line_profile: Data analysis agent powered by Claude
tools.detailed_description: An AI agent framework leveraging Claude to simplify data analysis tasks through a conversational interface, automating the generation of insights and visualizations.

tools.name: NLP2SQL
tools.one_line_profile: Natural language to SQL query transformation and visualization tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool that uses Azure OpenAI to transform natural language questions into SQL queries and visualize the results, enabling interactive data exploration.

tools.name: Lotus
tools.one_line_profile: AI-powered data processing library integrating LLMs with Pandas-like workflows
tools.detailed_description: Lotus is a library that enables semantic queries and data processing on datasets using Large Language Models (LLMs) and embeddings, providing a Pandas-compatible interface for AI-assisted data analysis.

tools.name: three-mlagents
tools.one_line_profile: Browser-based visualization for Unity ML-Agents using Three.js and Torch
tools.detailed_description: A tool for visualizing and training Unity ML-Agents in the browser, bridging web-based 3D visualization with reinforcement learning frameworks.

tools.name: DynamicBind
tools.one_line_profile: Deep equivariant generative model for protein-ligand complex structure prediction
tools.detailed_description: DynamicBind predicts ligand-specific protein-ligand complex structures using a deep equivariant generative model, handling flexible protein side-chains and backbone changes during binding.

tools.name: Lux
tools.one_line_profile: Automated visualization and insight generation for Pandas DataFrames
tools.detailed_description: Lux is a Python library that facilitates fast and easy data exploration by automating the visualization of dataframes. It suggests relevant visualizations based on data attributes and intent.

tools.name: Pynorama
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization toolkit for Natural Language Processing tasks
tools.detailed_description: Pynorama provides visualization capabilities specifically designed for Natural Language Processing (NLP) data and models, aiding in the interpretation of text analysis results.

tools.name: GenRL
tools.one_line_profile: Multimodal world models for embodied agent visualization and grounding
tools.detailed_description: GenRL enables the grounding of language and video prompts into embodied domains using latent world model states, allowing for the visualization of expected agent behaviors before execution.

tools.name: CellAgentChat
tools.one_line_profile: Agent-based modeling tool for single-cell communication analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based tool for inference, visualization, and analysis of cell-cell communication from single-cell data using agent-based modeling techniques.

tools.name: Earth Copilot
tools.one_line_profile: AI-powered geospatial application for Earth science data visualization
tools.detailed_description: An application that allows users to explore and visualize Earth science data using natural language queries, leveraging AI to bridge the gap between data and insight.

tools.name: VisTalk
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for Natural Language-based Visualization Authoring
tools.detailed_description: A JavaScript toolkit designed to facilitate the creation of visualizations through natural language interfaces, enabling easier authoring and interaction with data.

tools.name: BioEmu
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable emulation of protein equilibrium ensembles using generative AI
tools.detailed_description: BioEmu is a generative deep learning framework for predicting protein equilibrium ensembles, enabling scalable emulation of molecular dynamics and structural conformational changes.

tools.name: Data Formulator
tools.one_line_profile: AI-assisted tool for creating rich data visualizations
tools.detailed_description: Data Formulator leverages AI to help users create complex and rich visualizations by transforming data and mapping it to visual properties automatically or semi-automatically.

tools.name: LIDA
tools.one_line_profile: Automatic generation of visualizations and infographics using LLMs
tools.detailed_description: LIDA is a library for generating data visualizations and data-faithful infographics using Large Language Models. It handles data summarization, goal generation, visualization generation, and refinement.

tools.name: Pseudo-LiDAR++
tools.one_line_profile: Accurate depth estimation for 3D object detection from stereo images
tools.detailed_description: Pseudo-LiDAR++ improves 3D object detection in autonomous driving by enhancing depth estimation from stereo images, bridging the gap between image-based and LiDAR-based detection.

tools.name: Pseudo-LiDAR
tools.one_line_profile: 3D object detection from visual depth estimation
tools.detailed_description: The original implementation of Pseudo-LiDAR, a technique to convert stereo image depth maps into point clouds for 3D object detection, enabling LiDAR-like performance with cameras.

tools.name: MinusX
tools.one_line_profile: AI Data Analyst extension for Metabase dashboards
tools.detailed_description: MinusX is an AI-powered tool that integrates with Metabase to act as a data analyst, allowing users to ask business questions and dig deeper into dashboards via natural language.

tools.name: Mirror
tools.one_line_profile: Natural language interface for data query, summarization, and visualization
tools.detailed_description: A plug-and-play system that allows users to perform data query, summarization, and visualization through a natural language interface, facilitating automated insight generation.

tools.name: Mito
tools.one_line_profile: Jupyter extension for spreadsheet-based data analysis and code generation
tools.detailed_description: A Jupyter extension that provides a spreadsheet interface for data analysis, automatically generating Python code for edits and supporting AI-assisted context-aware chat for data manipulation.

tools.name: llm-text-to-knowledge-graph
tools.one_line_profile: Extract knowledge graphs from scientific text using LLMs
tools.detailed_description: A Python package and CLI for extracting knowledge graphs from text, specifically designed to support agents working with scientific hypotheses and experiment design in domains like biology.

tools.name: nl4dv
tools.one_line_profile: Natural Language for Data Visualization toolkit
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolkit that takes natural language queries and a dataset as input, and generates analytic specifications (Vega-Lite) for visualizations, enabling NL interfaces for existing visualization systems.

tools.name: chat2plot
tools.one_line_profile: Generate visualizations from natural language using LLMs
tools.detailed_description: A library that leverages Large Language Models (LLMs) to transform natural language queries into data visualizations, supporting automated insight generation from datasets.

tools.name: lidar
tools.one_line_profile: Delineate nested surface depressions from digital elevation data
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for processing digital elevation models (DEMs) to delineate nested surface depressions, useful for hydrological and geological analysis.

tools.name: BambooAI
tools.one_line_profile: A library leveraging LLMs for conversational data discovery, analysis, and visualization
tools.detailed_description: BambooAI is a lightweight library that uses Language Models (LLMs) to enable natural language interaction with datasets (Pandas DataFrames). It automates the process of data analysis and visualization by generating and executing Python code based on user queries, functioning as an AI-assisted insight tool.

tools.name: people-map
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization tool for mapping out researchers and their connections using NLP
tools.detailed_description: A visualization tool developed by the Polo Club of Data Science that uses Natural Language Processing to map out researchers, helping to visualize academic networks and collaborations. It serves the domain of Scientometrics and Science of Science.

tools.name: querychat
tools.one_line_profile: Conversational interface for data analysis in R and Python
tools.detailed_description: Developed by Posit (formerly RStudio), QueryChat allows users to interact with their data using natural language in both R and Python environments. It facilitates automated data querying and visualization, streamlining the exploratory data analysis workflow.

tools.name: DeTikZify
tools.one_line_profile: Synthesizing TikZ graphics programs from scientific figures and sketches
tools.detailed_description: DeTikZify is a multimodal AI tool designed to automatically generate TikZ code (a graphics language used in LaTeX) from input images such as scientific figures or hand-drawn sketches. It aids researchers in creating high-quality, editable scientific visualizations.

tools.name: pyRDDLGym
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for auto-generation of OpenAI Gym environments from RDDL descriptions
tools.detailed_description: pyRDDLGym is a toolkit that automatically generates OpenAI Gym environments from RDDL (Relational Dynamic Influence Diagram Language) files. It is used in operations research and AI planning research to simulate and model stochastic domains for reinforcement learning and planning algorithms.

tools.name: pylustrator
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive interface for editing and polishing Matplotlib figures
tools.detailed_description: Pylustrator provides a graphical user interface to interactively edit, resize, and annotate Matplotlib plots. It allows users to adjust subplots, legends, and styling elements via drag-and-drop, generating the corresponding Python code to reproduce the finalized publication-ready figures.

tools.name: automathon
tools.one_line_profile: Library for simulating and visualizing finite automata
tools.detailed_description: Automathon is a Python library designed to simulate and visualize finite automata (DFA, NFA, PDA). It allows researchers and students to define states and transitions, simulate input processing, and generate visual graph representations of the automata structure.

tools.name: lidar_localization_ros2
tools.one_line_profile: 3D LiDAR localization system using NDT/GICP algorithms
tools.detailed_description: A ROS 2 package for 3D LiDAR localization that utilizes Normal Distributions Transform (NDT) or Generalized ICP (GICP) for scan matching against a point cloud map. It provides real-time pose estimation for robotics and autonomous systems.

tools.name: lidarslam_ros2
tools.one_line_profile: 3D LiDAR SLAM system with graph-based optimization
tools.detailed_description: A ROS 2 package for 3D LiDAR Simultaneous Localization and Mapping (SLAM). It employs NDT/GICP for scan matching and performs graph-based pose optimization to generate consistent 3D point cloud maps.

tools.name: flocc
tools.one_line_profile: Agent-based modeling framework for web and server
tools.detailed_description: Flocc is a JavaScript/TypeScript library for creating agent-based models (ABM). It allows researchers to simulate complex systems with interacting agents, supporting visualization in the browser or headless execution on the server.

tools.name: EDA-GPT
tools.one_line_profile: LLM-powered automated exploratory data analysis tool
tools.detailed_description: EDA-GPT leverages Large Language Models to automate the process of Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA). It can generate insights, visualizations, and summary statistics from datasets through natural language interaction.

tools.name: PandasAI
tools.one_line_profile: Generative AI library for conversational data analysis
tools.detailed_description: PandasAI integrates Generative AI capabilities into pandas, allowing users to perform data analysis, generation, and visualization using natural language queries. It supports connecting to various data sources (DataFrames, SQL, CSV) and uses LLMs to translate questions into executable code and insights.

tools.name: AutoViz.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization library for automotive driving models
tools.detailed_description: AutoViz.jl provides visualization capabilities for the AutomotiveDrivingModels.jl ecosystem. It enables the rendering of automotive simulations, road networks, and vehicle dynamics, supporting research in autonomous driving and traffic simulation.

tools.name: AutomotiveVisualization.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization tools for AutomotiveSimulator.jl
tools.detailed_description: A Julia package designed to visualize simulations generated by AutomotiveSimulator.jl. It provides tools to render traffic scenarios, vehicle trajectories, and sensor data for analysis and verification of automotive algorithms.

tools.name: dbchat
tools.one_line_profile: Natural language interface for database analysis and visualization
tools.detailed_description: dbchat is a Model Context Protocol (MCP) server that enables natural language interaction with SQL databases. It allows users to perform complex analysis, generate visualizations, and build dashboards by conversing with the database, abstracting SQL query generation.

tools.name: pytorch-forecasting
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning library for time series forecasting
tools.detailed_description: PyTorch Forecasting is a library for time series forecasting with neural networks. It provides high-level APIs for state-of-the-art models (like Temporal Fusion Transformers) and facilitates data handling, training, and interpretation of time series data for scientific and industrial applications.

tools.name: LiDAR Situational Graphs
tools.one_line_profile: Real-time generation of Situational Graphs (S-Graphs) for robot pose and map optimization using 3D LiDAR data
tools.detailed_description: A C++ repository implementing a framework to generate Situational Graphs (S-Graphs) from 3D LiDAR data in real-time. It is designed for robotic applications, specifically enhancing pose estimation and map optimization by structuring raw sensor data into semantic and topological graphs.

tools.name: DATAGEN
tools.one_line_profile: AI-driven multi-agent research assistant for automating hypothesis generation and data analysis
tools.detailed_description: A multi-agent system designed to act as a research assistant. It automates key stages of the research process including hypothesis generation, data analysis, and report writing, leveraging AI agents to synthesize insights from data.

tools.name: PandasGPTAgent
tools.one_line_profile: Conversational agent for data analysis using OpenAI and LangChain
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool that enables users to interact with their data using natural language. It leverages OpenAI's LLMs and LangChain to interpret questions and perform data analysis tasks on Pandas DataFrames, facilitating automated insight generation.

tools.name: nlplot
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization module for Natural Language Processing analysis results
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed to facilitate the visualization of Natural Language Processing (NLP) analysis results. It provides high-level APIs to generate interactive plots for N-grams, word counts, and co-occurrence networks, aiding in the exploratory data analysis of text data.

tools.name: aiopandas
tools.one_line_profile: Async support extension for Pandas data processing pipelines
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight library that monkey-patches Pandas to add asynchronous support to common operations like map, apply, and transform. It enables parallel execution of async functions within Pandas workflows, useful for efficient scientific data processing pipelines.

tools.name: autoplotly
tools.one_line_profile: Automatic generation of interactive visualizations for statistical results in R
tools.detailed_description: An R package that automatically generates interactive visualizations for various statistical objects (like PCA, clustering results) using plotly. It bridges the gap between statistical analysis results and interactive exploration.

tools.name: ChartAI
tools.one_line_profile: AI-powered application for generating charts and insights from tabular data
tools.detailed_description: A Streamlit-based application that uses GPT-3 to allow users to interact with tabular data via natural language. It automatically generates charts and provides data insights based on user queries.

tools.name: Diffusion-EDFs
tools.one_line_profile: Bi-equivariant denoising generative modeling on SE(3) for robotic manipulation
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of Diffusion-EDFs, a method for bi-equivariant denoising generative modeling on SE(3) space. This tool is used for visual robotic manipulation tasks, enabling robots to learn manipulation skills from demonstrations.

tools.name: LiDAR R-CNN
tools.one_line_profile: Efficient and universal 3D object detector for LiDAR point clouds
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of LiDAR R-CNN, a second-stage detector that can be generally applied to existing 3D detectors to improve their performance. It processes LiDAR point clouds for precise 3D object detection.

tools.name: imu_lidar_calibration
tools.one_line_profile: Target-free extrinsic calibration tool for 3D LiDAR and IMU
tools.detailed_description: A C++ tool for the extrinsic calibration of a 3D LiDAR and an IMU without requiring specific targets. It estimates the rotation and translation between the two sensors, which is crucial for multi-sensor fusion in robotics and mapping.

tools.name: Vanna
tools.one_line_profile: RAG-based framework for Text-to-SQL generation and data interaction
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that enables users to chat with their SQL databases using Large Language Models (LLMs). It uses retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) to generate accurate SQL queries from natural language questions, facilitating automated data insight and visualization workflows.

tools.name: DLIO
tools.one_line_profile: Direct LiDAR-Inertial Odometry algorithm for precise motion correction
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight LiDAR-inertial odometry algorithm that employs a coarse-to-fine approach to construct continuous-time trajectories. It is designed for precise motion correction and localization in robotic and mapping applications.

tools.name: DLO
tools.one_line_profile: Direct LiDAR Odometry frontend for consistent localization
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight and computationally efficient frontend LiDAR odometry solution that provides consistent and accurate localization for autonomous systems and mapping tasks.

tools.name: LSD
tools.one_line_profile: LiDAR SLAM and Detection architecture for autonomous perception
tools.detailed_description: An open-source perception architecture combining LiDAR SLAM and object detection. It provides a framework for spatial mapping and environmental perception in autonomous systems.

tools.name: EDA
tools.one_line_profile: Automated Exploratory Data Analysis program for Stata
tools.detailed_description: A Stata program designed to automate the process of exploratory data analysis, generating summary statistics and visualizations to facilitate data understanding.

tools.name: MRAgent
tools.one_line_profile: LLM-based automation tool for Mendelian Randomization analysis
tools.detailed_description: An AI agent tool that automates the workflow of Mendelian randomization analysis. It autonomously scans literature, selects GWAS data, and generates reports to aid researchers in exploring disease causality.

tools.name: CameraAutoFocus
tools.one_line_profile: Image sharpness evaluation and autofocus metric tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool providing 37 different image convolution operators to evaluate image sharpness and clarity. It is used for determining optimal camera focus and characterizing lens performance in instrumentation and imaging applications.

tools.name: MCP Excel Server
tools.one_line_profile: Model Context Protocol server enabling LLM-driven analysis and visualization of Excel data
tools.detailed_description: A server implementation of the Model Context Protocol (MCP) that connects Large Language Models (LLMs) with Excel files. It allows users to perform data reading, analysis, and visualization tasks on spreadsheets through natural language interfaces, facilitating automated insight generation.

tools.name: OpenChatBI
tools.one_line_profile: LLM-powered intelligent business intelligence and data analysis platform
tools.detailed_description: An intelligent BI tool that leverages Large Language Models (LLMs) via LangChain and LangGraph to convert natural language queries into SQL, execute data analysis, and generate visualizations. It serves as an AI agent for interactive data exploration.

tools.name: DataMind
tools.one_line_profile: LLM-based autonomous agents for automated data analysis
tools.detailed_description: An open-source framework implementing LLM-based agents specifically designed for data analysis tasks. It automates the process of data interpretation, processing, and insight generation, serving as a research tool for AI-assisted data science.

tools.name: funny_lidar_slam
tools.one_line_profile: Real-time multifunctional Lidar SLAM package for 3D mapping
tools.detailed_description: A real-time Simultaneous Localization and Mapping (SLAM) package designed for Lidar sensors. It processes sensor data to estimate trajectory and build 3D maps, supporting scientific and engineering tasks in robotics and geospatial analysis.

tools.name: highlight_text
tools.one_line_profile: Matplotlib extension for highlighting text substrings in plots
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that extends matplotlib's text plotting capabilities, allowing users to easily highlight specific substrings within text annotations. This is useful for creating emphatic and clear scientific visualizations.
